task: Grasping a Wine Glass from the Shelf

physical_requirements.description: The shelf should be stable and secure to support the weight of the wine glass.
Ensure that the object is within a comfortable reach to avoid unnecessary strain.
A firm grip is needed to securely hold the wine glass without risk of dropping it.
Ensure controlled and smooth motion when reaching for and lifting the wine glass.

sensory_requirements.description: Used to locate the wine glass on the shelf and ensure proper alignment for grasping.
Senses the shape of the wine glass and helps ensure a secure grip, especially on the stem or base.
Provides feedback from the hand and arm to adjust the position and pressure while grasping the glass.
Senses the temperature of the wine glass to adjust handling, especially if it is chilled.
